name: Soul Of The Forest (JasonBright)
description:
You are the soul of the forest - and you should keep it alive, while everything trying to kill your trees.

To win this battle, you should propagate your forest and find power-ups on the map. You will be victorious, once you fill map wth forest enough.

Rules:

  • Propagate and defend forest using your abilities

  • Abilities cost energy, tree tiles produce energy
  • You can place trees only near your fully grown trees

  • You can place sawmp plants only near fully grown trees or swamp plants

  • You can place trees on swamps only after swamp planes transform it into turf
  • You can place springs only on forest tiles, and not too far away from other springs
  • BEWARE FOREST FIRES

  • If you lose your Soul Tree - you lose.
